tourBios.exmtStatus: Exempt - Finished 11-49 at 2014 Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament (subject to second reshuffle)
tourBios.curYearHigh: Played in 13 Web.com Tour events. Made the cut in his first two (T49, T69) but missed the next 11.
tourBios.carHigh: 2014: Finished T28 at Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament in December...Was medalist by four shots at the second stage Qualifying Tournament at Murrieta, Calif...Was also medalist at his pre-qualifier in La Quinta, Calif...Won two events on the Golden State Tour (Indian Wells and Battle at Bayonet).
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Named first-team All-Pac-12 in 2013-14 at the University of Washington. Was 2014 team MVP. Was on the 2013 Ben Hogan "Watch List." Reached as high as No. 7 in the Golfweek/Sagarin rankings during 2012-13 season. Won the 2012 Pac-12 Preview...Has qualified for one U.S. Public Links and two U.S. Amateurs...Won the 2011 San Diego County Amateur...Led his high school team to the California State Championship in 2009 at Poppy Hills...Finished sixth in the 2009 World Junior Championships at Torrey Pines.
tourBios.personal: Attended La Costa Canyon High School in La Costa, Calif...Grew up playing Coronado Municipal GC outside San Diego...Grandfather played pro handball in Denmark...First-tee intro would be "Hall of Fame" by The Script...Favorites include Washington Huskies, Seattle Seahawks, "The Profit" and "Shark Tank. Likes "Home Alone," "Anchorman" and "Stepbrothers" and enjoys the music of Calvin Harris, the books Think and Grow Rich and likes watching Earl Thomas and Russell Wilson play...Most famous person he has met is Fred Couples at the University of Washington Husky Golf Center...Was a final-round standard bearer for Rocco Mediate and Geoff Ogilvy at the 2008 U.S. Open at Torrey Pines...Would like to trade places with Stephen A. Smith for a day so he could "be a sporting encyclopedia."...Dream foursome would include Jamie Sadlowski, Bubba Watson and Angel Cabrera...Bucket list includes visiting Machu Picchu, Greece and "that 400-yard, par-4 helicopter hole in South Africa."...Speaks as he says, "a little bit of Danish."...If not a pro golfer, would be a chef. Can make "a mean lemon chicken."...Twitter handle is @trevorsimsby.

tourBios.curYrHigh: Played in 13 Web.com Tour events. Made the cut in his first two (T49, T69) but missed the next 11.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T49th in 2015 at the Panama Claro Championship.
